Professor | 2008 - now Dept. of Computer Science, National Tsing Hua University, Taiwan. Principal Research Manager | 2018 - 2022 Microsoft AI R&D Center, Taipei, Taiwan. Chair | 2015 - 2018 Dept. of Computer Science, National Tsing Hua University, Hsinchu, Taiwan. Director | 2011 - 2015 Center of Computer and Communication, National Tsing Hua University, Taiwan. Associate Professor | 2001 - 2008 Dept. of Computer Science, National Tsing Hua University, Taiwan. Assistant Professor | 1999 - 2001 Dept. of Computer Science, National Tsing Hua University, Hsinchu, Taiwan. Member of Technical Staff | 1995 - 1999 Imaging and Visualization Dept., Siemens Corporate Research, Princeton, New Jersey, USA. Education Ph.D. | 1995 Electrical & Computer Engineering, University of Florida, Gainesville, Florida. M.S. | 1988 Electrical Engineering, National Tsing Hua University, Hsinchu, Taiwan. B.S. | 1986 Electrical Engineering, National Tsing Hua University, Hsinchu, Taiwan.
